data.title: Quiz: How Well Do You Know These Books About Crayons?
data.meta_description: What if you had a magic crayon? In the book Harold and the Purple Crayon, Harold can draw himself a whole new world. This fantastic…
data.text:
What if you had a magic crayon? In the book Harold and the Purple Crayon, Harold can draw himself a whole new world. This fantastic book has been popular since it was first published. It's the beginning of a series of 9 books following Harold as he draws new stories he can enjoy. There's also been a TV series about Harold and a movie is being released in 2024.

But Harold isn't the only fictional character featured in books about crayons. See how much you know about books about crayons, and crayons themselves, with this quiz.

Which of these books about crayons has a movie coming out in 2024?

What year was Harold and the Purple Crayon originally published?

1950

1985

1920

1955

In which clever story does the main character struggle with being judged and labeled?

The first book in Paula Danziger’s Amber Brown series is called Amber Brown Is Not a Crayon. Which of these is not a title in the series?

Amber Brown is Green with Envy

Amber Brown Sees Red

Amber Brown is Tickled Pink

Amber Brown and the Gray Day

Harold and the Purple Crayon was written and illustrated by Crockett Johnson. Johnson also illustrated:

Millions of Cats

The Carrot Seed

The Story of Ferdinand

The Snowy Day

Harold and his purple crayon appeared in seven books by Crockett Johnson. Which one is not part of the series?

A Picture for Harold’s Room

Harold’s Circus

Harold and Hog Pretend for Real

Harold at the North Pole

Which book by Laura Vaccaro Seeger is about America's favorite crayon color (according to Crayola)?

Which popular children's tv show memorably showed how crayons are made in a factory?

Email
